Verses: 1 karththar Theerkkadharisiyaagiya Eremiyaavaikkondu Baabilonukkum Kaldheyar Dhesaththukkum Virodhamaaga Uraiththa Vasanam:

2 baabilon Pidipattadhu; Pel Vetkappattadhu; Meraadhaak Norungundadhu; Adhinudaiya Silaigal Lachchaiyadaindhadhu; Adhinudaiya Vikkiragangal Norungippoyina Endru Jaadhigalukkulle Ariviththup Prasiththampannungal; Idhai Maraikkaamal Kodiyetri Vilambarampannungal.
3 adharku Virodhamaai Vadakkeyirundhu Oru Jaadhi Vandhu, Adhin Dhesaththaip Paazhaakkippodum; Adhile Kudiyiruppaarillai; Manusharode Mirugangalum Odippoividum.

4 annaatkalilum Akkaalaththilum Isravel Puththirar Varuvaargal; Avargalum Yoodhaa Puththirarum Egamaai Azhudhu, Nadandhuvandhu, Thangal Dhevanaagiya Karththaraith Theduvaargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
5 marakkappadaadha Niththiya Udanpadikkaiyinaal Naam Karththarai Serndhukolvom Vaarungal Endru Seeyonukku Neraai Mugangalaith Thiruppi, Seeyonukkup Pogira Vazhi Edhuvendru Kettu Visaarippaargal.

6 en Janangal Kaanaamarpona Aadugal, Avargaludaiya Meyppargal Avargalai Sidharappanni, Parvadhangalil Alaiyavittaargal; Oru Malaiyilirundhu Marumalaikkup Ponaargal; Thangal Thozhuvaththai Marandhu Vittaargal.

7 avargalaik Kandupidiththavargal Ellaarum Avargalaip Patchiththaargal; Avargaludaiya Saththurukkal: Engal Mel Kutramillai; Avargal Needhiyin Vaasasthalaththile Karththarukku Virodhamaaga, Thangal Pidhaakkal Nambina Karththarukku Virodhamaagave Paavancheydhaargal Endraargal.
8 baabilonin Naduvilirundhodi Kaldheyarin Dhesaththaivittup Purappattu, Mandhaiyinmunnadakkum Kadaakkalaippol Irungal.

9 idho, Naan Baabilonukku Virodhamaaga Vadadhesaththil Irukkum Periya Jaadhigalin Koottaththai Ezhuppi, Adhai Varappannuven; Avargal Adharku Virodhamaaga Aayaththampannuvaargal; Angeyirundhu Varugiravargalaal Adhu Pidikkappadum; Avargaludaiya Ambugal Saamarththiyamulla Paraakkiramasaaliyin Ambugalaippol Irukkum; Avaigal Virudhaavaaith Thirumbuvadhillai.
10 kaldheyaa Kollaiyaagum; Adhaik Kollaiyidugiravargal Ellaarum Paripooranamadaivaargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
11 en Sudhandharaththaik Kollaiyitta Neengal Sandhoshiththeergale, Kalikoorndheergale, Pulmeyndhu Kozhuththa Kadaariyaippol Pooriththu, Valiyarishabampol Mukkaaram Podugireergale.
12 ungal Thaai Migavum Vetki, Ungalaip Petraval Naanamadaivaal; Idho, Aval Jaadhigalukkulle Kadaisiyaavadhumandri, Vanaandharamum Varatchiyum Andharaveliyumaavaal.
13 karththarin Kobaththinaale Adhu Kudiyatradhum Perumpaazhumaayirukkum; Baabilonaik Kadandhupogira Evanum Adhin Ellaa Vaadhaigalinimiththamum Bramiththu, Eesalpoduvaan.

14 neengal Ellaarum Baabilonukku Virodhamaai Sutrilum Anivaguththu Nindru, Villai Naanetri, Adhinmel Ambugalai Eyyungal; Ambuchchelavaip Paaraadheyungal; Adhu, Karththarukku Virodhamaaip Paavancheydhadhu,

15 adharku Virodhamaai Sutrilum Aarppariyungal; Adhu Thannaik Kaiyaliththadhu; Adhin Asthibaarangal Vizhundhadhu, Adhin Madhilgal Idikkappattadhu; Idhu Karththarvaangum Pazhi; Adhinidaththil Pazhivaangungal; Adhu Seydhadhupolave Neengalum Adharku Seyyungal.

16 vidhaividhaikkiravanaiyum Aruppukkaalaththil Arivaalaip Pidikkiravanaiyum Baabilonil Iraadhapadi Sangaarampannungal; Kollugira Pattayaththukkuth Thappa Avaravar Thangal Janaththandaikkuth Thiruppik Kondu, Avaravar Thangal Dhesaththukku Odippovaargal.

17 isravel Therippattuppona Aadu, Singangal Adhaith Thuraththina; Mudhalil Aseeriyaa Raajaa Adhaip Patchiththaan; Kadaisiyil Baabilon Raajaavaagiya Indha Nebugaadhnechchaar Adhin Elumbugalai Muriththaan.
18 aagaiyaal Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal; Idho, Naan Aseeriyaa Raajaavai Dhandiththadhupol Baabilon Raajaavaiyum Avan Dhesaththaiyum Dhandiththu,
19 isravelai Adhin Vaasasthalaththukkuth Thirumbivarappannuven; Appozhudhu Adhu Karmelilum Paasaanilum Meyum; Eppiraayeemin Malaigalilum Keeleyaaththilum Adhin Aaththumaa Thirupthiyaagum.

20 annaatkalilum Akkaalaththilum Isravelin Akkiramam Thedappattaalum Adhu Kaanaadhirukkum; Yoodhaavin Paavangal Thedappattaalum Avaigal Kidaiyaadhirukkum; Naan Meedhiyaaga Vaikkiravargalukku Mannippen Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

21 meradhaayeem Dhesaththukku Virodhamaagavum Pekodu Kudigalukku Virodhamaagavum Nee Poi, Avargalaith Thuraththi, Yaavaiyum Paazhaakki Sangaarampanni, Naan Unakku Kattalaiyittapadiyellaam Sey Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
22 dhesaththile Yuththaththin Saththamum Magaa Sangaaramum Undu.
23 sarva Boomiyin Sammatti Eppadi Muriththu Udaikkappattadhu! Jaadhigalukkulle Baabilon Eppadip Paazhaappoyitru!
24 baabilone, Unakkuk Kanniyai Vaiththen, Nee Adhai Ariyaamal Adhile Sikkunduponaai; Nee Adappattum Pidipattum Ponaai, Nee Karththarode Yuththankalandhaaye.

25 karththar Thammudaiya Aayudhasaalaiyaith Thirandhu, Thammudaiya Sinaththin Asthiraayudhangalai Eduththukkonduvandhaar; Idhu Kaldheyar Dhesaththile Senaigalinkarththaraagiya Aandavar Seygira Kiriyai.
26 kadaiyaandhiraththilirundhu Adharku Virodhamaaga Vandhu, Adhin Kalanjiyangalaith Thirandhu, Kuviyal Kuviyalaagak Kuviththu, Adhil Ondrum Meedhiyaagaadhapadikku Adhai Mutrilum Azhiththuppodungal.
27 adhin Kaalaigalaiyellaam Vettungal; Avaigal Kolaikkalam Serakkadavadhu; Aiyo! Avargal Visaarikkappadum Naal Vandhadhe.
28 nammudaiya Dhevan Pazhivaanginadhai, Avar Thamadhu Aalayaththukkaagap Pazhivaanginadhaiye, Seeyonile Arivikkumpadikku, Baabilon Dhesaththilirundhu Thappiyodivandhavargalin Saththam Ketkappadum.

29 baabilonukku Virodhamaai Varumpadi Vilveerarai Azhaiyungal; Vil Valaikkiravargale, Neengal Ellaarum Adharku Virodhamaai Sutrilum Paalayamirangungal, Oruvaraiyum Thappavidaadhirungal; Adhin Kiriyaikkuththakka Palanai Adharku Sarikattungal; Adhu Seydhadhinpadiyellaam Adharku Seyyungal; Adhu Isravelin Parisuththaraagiya Karththarukku Virodhamaaga Idumbuseydhadhu.
30 aagaiyaal Adhin Vaalibar Adhin Veedhigalil Vizhuvaargal; Adhin Yuththaveerar Ellaarum Annaalile Sangaaramaavaargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
31 idho, Idumbullavane, Naan Unakku Virodhamaaga Varugiren Endru Senaigalin Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar; Naan Unnai Visaarikkunkaalamaagiya Unnudaiya Naal Vandhadhu.
32 idumbullavan Idarivizhuvaan; Avanai Eduththu Niruththuvaarillai; Naan Avanudaiya Pattanangalil Akkiniyaik Koluththuven, Adhu Avan Sutruppuraththaar Ellaaraiyum Patchikkum.

33 senaigalin Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Isravel Puththirarum Yoodhaa Puththirarum Egamaai Odungundaargal; Avargalai Siraiyaakkina Yaavarum Avargalai Vidamaattom Endru Kettiyaaip Pidiththukkondaargal.

34 avargaludaiya Meetparovenil Vallamaiyullavar, Senaigalin Karththar Enbadhu Avarudaiya Naamam; Dhesaththai Ilaippaarap Pannuvadharkum, Baabilon Kudigalaith Thaththalikkappannuvadharkum Avargaludaiya Vazhakkai Avar Nadaththuvaar.
35 pattayam Kaldheyarmelum, Baabilon Kudigalmelum, Adhinudaiya Prabukkalmelum, Adhinudaiya Gnaanigalmelum Varumendru Karththar Sollugiraar.
36 pattayam Poigalaip Pinaikkiravargalmelum Varum; Avargal Paiththiyakkaararaavaargal; Pattayam Adhin Paraakkiramasaaligal Melum Varum, Avargal Kalanguvaargal.

37 pattayam Adhin Kudhiraigal Melum, Adhin Radhangalmelum, Adhin Naduvil Irukkira Palajaadhiyaana Janangal Yaavarmelum Varum, Avargal Pedigalaavaargal; Pattayam Adhin Pokkishangalinmel Varum, Avaigal Kollaiyaagum.
38 varatchi Adhin Thanneergalmel Varum Avaigal Varandupom; Adhu Vikkiraga Dhesam; Arukkalippaana Silaigalinmel Manamayangiyirukkiraargal.

39 aagaiyaal Kaattumirugangalum Origalum Adhile Kudiyirukkum; Kottaangal Adhile Thangum; Ini Endrendraikkum Adhu Kudiyetrappaduvadhillai; Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaaga Oruvarum Adhil Sanjarippadhumillai.

40 dhevan Sodhomaiyum Gomoraavaiyum Adhin Sutruppurangalaiyum Kavizhththuppottadhupola Idhaiyum Kavizhththuppoduven Endru Karththarsollugiraar; Oruvarum Adhil Kudiyiruppadhillai, Oru Manupuththiranum Adhil Thanguvadhumillai.
41 idho, Vadakkeyirundhu Oru Janamum Periya Jaadhiyum Varum; Boomiyin Ellaigalilirundhu Balaththa Raajaakkal Ezhumbuvaargal.

42 avargal Villum Velum Pidiththuvaruvaargal; Avargal Irakkamillaadha Kodiyar; Avargal Iraichchal Samuththira Iraichchalpol Irukkum; Baabilon Kumaaraththiye, Avargal Unakku Virodhamaaga Yuththaththukku Aayaththappatta Aatkalaaik Kudhiraigalin Mel Eri Varuvaargal.
43 avargal Varugira Seydhiyai Baabilon Raajaa Ketkaiyil Avan Kaigal Thalarum; Idukkamum Prasava Vedhanaippadugiravalukkundaagum Vedhanaiyappondra Vedhanaiyum Avanaip Pidikkum.

44 idho, Purandu Odugira Yordhaanilirundhu Singaththaippol Balavaanudaiya Thaabaraththukku Virodhamaaga Varugiraan; Avanai Angeyirundhu Sadidhiyile Odivarappannuven; Naan Adharku Virodhamaagak Kattalaiyittu, Anuppath Therindhu Kollappattavan Yaar? Enakku Samaanamaanavan Yaar? Enakku Thittancholbavan Yaar? Enakku Munbaaga Nirkappogira Meyppan Yaar?

45 aagaiyaal Karththar Baabilonukku Virodhamaaga Yosiththa Aalosanaiyaiyum Avar Kaldheyar Dhesaththukku Virodhamaaga Ninaiththirukkira Ninaivugalaiyum Kelungal; Meyyaagave Mandhaiyil Siriyavargal Avargalaip Pidiththizhuppaargal; Meyyaagave Avargal Irukkira Thaabarangalai Avar Paazhaakkuvaar.
46 baabilon Pidipattadhin Saththaththinaal Boomi Adhirum, Adhin Kooppidudhal Jaadhigalukkulle Ketkappadum.
